thing-type.label: LZW30-SN Red Series On/Off switch
thing-type.description: Red Series On/Off switch<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtInovelli’s new on/off switch is packed with features and designed with your house in mind.</p&gt <p&gtFrom a hardware side we’ve upgraded our Z-Wave module for better distance and added in one of our favorite features: power monitoring. The switch can be used in any 3-Way or 4-Way setting and allows you to use either an auxiliary switch, or your existing dumb switch.</p&gt <p&gtFrom a firmware side, this switch has it all (literally). Scene control, notifications (flashes if your garage door is left open) and can be configured on any HUB.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtInclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtOnce the inclusion process has started press the config button 3X and the LED bar will flash blue. If the switch was included successfully the bar will turn GREEN, however if the switch was not included successfully it will turn RED.</p&gt <br /&gt<h2&gtExclusion Information</h2&gt<p&gtPut your HUB in Exclusion mode and press the Config Button 3X until your HUB says the device is excluded.</p&gt

parameter.name: config_1_1
parameter.label: 1: Power On State
parameter.description: Power On State<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtWhen power is restored, the switch reverts to either On, Off or last level</p&gt <p&gt0 = Returns to State before Power Outage</p&gt <p&gt1 = On</p&gt <p&gt2 = Off</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_2_1
parameter.label: 2: Invert Switch
parameter.description: Invert Switch<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtInverts the switch (Tap Down = On, Tap Up = Off)</p&gt <p&gt0 = Disabled</p&gt <p&gt1 = Enabled</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_3_2
parameter.label: 3: Auto Off Timer
parameter.description: Auto Off Timer<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtAutomatically turns the switch off after x amount of seconds</p&gt <p&gt0 = Disabled</p&gt <p&gt1= 1 second</p&gt <p&gt32767 = 32767 seconds</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_4_1
parameter.label: 4: Association Behavior
parameter.description: Association Behavior<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtWhen should the switch send commands to the associated devices:</p&gt <p&gt01 = Local, 02 = 3-Way, 03 = 3-Way &amp; Local, 04 = Z-Wave Hub, 05 = Z-Wave Hub &amp; Local, 06 = Z-Wave Hub &amp; 3-Way, 07 = Z-Wave Hub &amp; Local &amp; 3-Way, 08 = Timer, 09 = Timer &amp; Local, 10 = Timer &amp; 3-Way, 11 =Timer &amp; 3-Way &amp; Local, 12 = Timer &amp; Z-Wave Hub, 13 = Timer &amp; Z-Wave Hub &amp; Local, 14 = Timer &amp; Z-Wave Hub &amp; 3-Way, 15 = All</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_5_2
parameter.label: 5: LED Indicator Color
parameter.description: LED Indicator Color<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis will set the default color of the LED bar. Calculated by using a hue color circle (Value / 255 * 360). Se website for more info.</p&gt <p&gt0 = Red</p&gt <p&gt21 = Orange</p&gt <p&gt42 = Yellow</p&gt <p&gt85 = Green</p&gt <p&gt127 = Cyan</p&gt <p&gt170 = Blue</p&gt <p&gt212 = Violet</p&gt <p&gt234 = Pink</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_6_1
parameter.label: 6: LED Indicator Intensity
parameter.description: LED Indicator Intensity<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis will set the intensity of the LED bar (ie: how bright it is) in 10% increments</p&gt <p&gt0 = Off</p&gt <p&gt1 = Low</p&gt <p&gt5 = Medium</p&gt <p&gt10 = High</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_7_1
parameter.label: 7: LED Indicator Intensity (When Off)
parameter.description: LED Indicator Intensity (When Off)<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis is the intensity of the LED bar when the switch is off in 10% increments.</p&gt <p&gt0 = Off</p&gt <p&gt1 = Low</p&gt <p&gt5 = Medium</p&gt <p&gt10 = High</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_8_4
parameter.label: 8: LED Strip Effect
parameter.description: LED Strip Effect<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis will allow you to add some sweet effects to your LED bar (ie: pulse, chase, solid, etc)</p&gt <p&gtByte 1 = Color. This will set the color of the LED bar. Calculated by using a hue color circle (Value / 255 * 360).</p&gt <p&gtByte 2 = Brightness. Sets the brightness in 10% increments.</p&gt <p&gtByte 3 = Duration. </p&gt <p&gtByte 4 = Effect. Sets the effect: 0 = Off, 1 = Solid, 2 = Fast Blink, 3 = Slow Blink, 4 = Pulse</p&gt <p&gtAddition: To get the final code for the desired color/effect/duration, use this calculator: https://nathanfiscus.github.io/inovelli-notification-calc/</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_8_4_000000FF
parameter.label: 8: LED Strip Effect (Color)
parameter.description: LED Strip Effect (Color)<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis will allow you to add some sweet effects to your LED bar (ie: pulse, chase, solid, etc)</p&gt <p&gtThis will set the color of the LED bar. Calculated by using a hue color circle (Value / 255 * 360).</p&gt <p&gt0 = Red</p&gt <p&gt21 = Orange</p&gt <p&gt42 = Yellow</p&gt <p&gt85 = Green</p&gt <p&gt127 = Cyan</p&gt <p&gt170 = Blue</p&gt <p&gt212 = Violet</p&gt <p&gt234 = Pink</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_8_4_0000FF00
parameter.label: 8: LED Strip Effect (Brightness)
parameter.description: LED Strip Effect (Brightness)<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis will allow you to add some sweet effects to your LED bar (ie: pulse, chase, solid, etc)</p&gt <p&gtSets the brightness in 10% increments.</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_8_4_00FF0000
parameter.label: 8: LED Strip Effect (Duration)
parameter.description: LED Strip Effect (Duration)<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis will allow you to add some sweet effects to your LED bar (ie: pulse, chase, solid, etc)</p&gt <p&gt1 = 1 Second</p&gt <p&gt2 = 2 Seconds</p&gt <p&gt3 = 3 Seconds</p&gt <p&gt4 = 4 Seconds</p&gt <p&gt5 = 5 Seconds</p&gt <p&gt6 = 6 Seconds</p&gt <p&gt7 = 7 Seconds</p&gt <p&gt8 = 8 Seconds</p&gt <p&gt9 = 9 Seconds</p&gt <p&gt10 = 10 Seconds</p&gt <p&gt20 = 20 Seconds</p&gt <p&gt30 = 30 Seconds</p&gt <p&gt40 = 40 Seconds</p&gt <p&gt50 = 50 Seconds</p&gt <p&gt60 = 60 Seconds</p&gt <p&gt62 = 2 Minutes</p&gt <p&gt63 = 3 Minutes</p&gt <p&gt64 = 4 Minutes</p&gt <p&gt65 = 5 Minutes</p&gt <p&gt255 = Indefinitely</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_8_4_7F000000
parameter.label: 8: LED Strip Effect (Effect)
parameter.description: LED Strip Effect (Effect)<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThis will allow you to add some sweet effects to your LED bar (ie: pulse, chase, solid, etc)</p&gt <p&gt0 = Off</p&gt <p&gt1 = Solid</p&gt <p&gt2 = Fast Blink</p&gt <p&gt3 = Slow Blink</p&gt <p&gt4 = Pulse</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_9_1
parameter.label: 9: LED Strip Timeout
parameter.description: LED Strip Timeout<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtWhen the LED strip is disabled (LED Strip Intensity is set to 0), this setting allows the LED strip to turn on temporarily while being adjusted. Time is in seconds.<br /&gt</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_10_1
parameter.label: 10: Active Power Reports
parameter.description: Active Power Reports<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe power level change that will result in a new power report being sent (% of previous report)</p&gt <p&gt0 = Disabled</p&gt <p&gt10 = 10% of previous report</p&gt <p&gt100 = 100% of previous report</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_11_2
parameter.label: 11: Periodic Power & Energy Reports
parameter.description: Periodic Power &amp; Energy Reports<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtTime period between consecutive power and energy reports being sent (in seconds)</p&gt <p&gt0 = 0 seconds</p&gt <p&gt1 = 1 second</p&gt <p&gt32767 = 32767 seconds</p&gt <p&gtTimer resets after every report is sent</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_12_1
parameter.label: 12: Energy Reports
parameter.description: Energy Reports<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtThe energy level change that will result in a new energy report being sent (% of previous report)</p&gt <p&gt0 = Disabled</p&gt <p&gt10 = 10% of previous report</p&gt <p&gt100 = 100% of previous report</p&gt</p&gt

parameter.name: config_51_1
parameter.label: 51: Enable Instant On
parameter.description: Enable Instant On<br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt<p&gtEnable instant on (ie: disable the 700ms delay) for physical switch. Note, if you disable the delay, it will also disable scene control except for Button 1 (ie: tap up 1x or tap down 1x) and button 7 (config button). All other buttons (2-6) will be disabled.</p&gt 0: No Delay 1: 700ms Delay (default)</p&gt

parameter.name: group_1
parameter.label: 1: Lifeline
parameter.description: <br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gtMembers of this group will receive unsolicited messages related to the status of the switch.</p&gt

parameter.name: group_2
parameter.label: 2: Basic Set
parameter.description: <br /&gt<h1&gtOverview</h1&gt<p&gt1. Single press Up button sends BasicSet (0xFF)</p&gt <p&gtand</p&gt <p&gt2. Single press Down sends BasicSet (0x00)</p&gt
